thread.section_title: REI Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of REI | www.rei.com
thread.title: Brittany

author: Brittany
title: Brittany
text: Order some boots online that were out of stock at my local REI. The tracking info said they would be delivered in time for my honeymoon, but when my package came with all my other winter gear the boots were not there. I immediately went into my email to check & it said they were processing! Ah! (Honeymoon less than a week away) I called customer service & got transferred to JoAnne. She located my order & said that my boots were coming from a store rather than the warehouse & they ran out of the boots. She then took my phone # & said she would check into it for me, 10 minutes later she called me back saying that she canceled my previous order & reordered my boots...not only that but she put a rush order on my boots (FREE of charge!!!) in order to get them in time for my honeymoon! She offically made my day & I couldn't thank her enough for her amazing customer service & taking such GREAT care of me! YOU ROCK JOANNE!!! Thanks again! =)
